They never had a workers' congress, even most recently, and the union
had no real power right up until he left.They were talking about reviving
union functions when he left, but these things take a while to actually
carry out. They never had elections for shop directors or group leaders.
These people are appointed from above.
that there was gangqing among those who were on the same side earlier, but
the relations between people on different sides were not so close. But this
was not a political problem. And the problem was not a serious one, since
their towm was just a small one.
